long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to tedious searches and manual calculations! This browser add-on seamlessly integrates into Futbin.com, enhancing your gameplay and analysis:

- YouTube Review Search: Forget browsing countless search results. Instantly access relevant YouTube reviews for any player simply by clicking a button on their Futbin page. Stay informed and make informed decisions about your squad!

- SBC Rating Counter: No more manually adding up individual player ratings. This addon automatically computes the total rating of your SBC solutions, saving you time and effort. Analyze and optimize your SBC strategies like a pro!
